Title: Relates to the adoption or amendment of comprehensive rezoning plans by cities, villages, and towns
Summary: Authorizes the adoption or amendment of comprehensive rezoning plans by cities, villages, and towns prior to the completion of corresponding city, village, or town comprehensive plans.
LawCode: Amd ยง28-a, Gen City L; amd ยง7-722, Vil L; amd ยง272-a, Town L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, the village law and the town law, in relation to the adoption or amendment of comprehensive rezoning plans by cities, villages, and towns
